newsitem.title: HUNGARY: HUNGARY'S O/N EASE TO END AT 20.25 PERCENT.
newsitem.headline: HUNGARY'S O/N EASE TO END AT 20.25 PERCENT.

text.p: Hungary's overnight rates closed lower on Thursday in abundant liquidity, traders said.
The overnight rates finished at 20.25 percent compared with Wednesday's closing of 20.75 percent.
"There are large amounts of money available," said Sandor Tolonics of Commerzbank.
He added that overnight rate movements over the next few days would depend on how much money the large banks commit to the central bank's one-week reverse repo facility.
He said that tax payments on May 10 and 15 could also drain some of the excess funds away.
"Except for unforeseeable events, rates are unlikely to rise above 21 percent," Tolonics said.
